name: Anna (itch)
description:
A short exploration game about childhood memories. The game is set in Eastern Europe. As you search for missing photographs you get to relive a bit of Anna's childhood days and playful imagination.

There are three mini games, each connecting to these memories. Can you try to put the pieces together? Or maybe just enjoy the scenery. It's up to you. There's a bit of the story hidden everywhere.

This game was created as a graduation project.
Be sure to check out the soundtrack too!

More work by mirmarka.
